title: Charles Christian Hook
text:
Charles Christian Hook (1870–1938) was an American architect. He was also the founder of FreemanWhite, Inc. a Haskell Company (1892), the oldest practicing firm in <a href="North%20Carolina">North Carolina</a> and currently the 11th oldest <a href="architecture">architecture</a> firm in the United States.
A number of his works are listed on the U.S. <a href="National%20Register%20of%20Historic%20Places">National Register of Historic Places</a>.
